headline: Turn what you already have at home into easy meals, save money, and stop throwing food away.
inviteFriendsDescription: Share BiteBook with friends and help each other save money and reduce food waste.
scanQRCode: Ask your friend to scan the code below:
shareLink: Share this link with your friends:
leaderboardDescription: See how you rank on saving money and reducing food waste.
howToProgressFasterDescription: To level up faster, cook more from what you already have at home, finish leftovers, and plan your meals before you shop.
todaysChallengeDescription: Create a meal using ingredients you already have in your fridge or pantry.
todaysChallengeDescription2: Use what you have at home to complete today’s challenge.
removeFriendDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} as friend?
helpUs: Help more families cook smarter and waste less food.
deleteAccountConfirmation: Do you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be lost.
deleteAccountQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
name: Name
checkYourEmailDescription: We just sent you a confirmation email. If it doesn’t arrive soon, check your spam folder.
updatePasswordDescription: Enter a new password to secure your BiteBook account. You’ll use this password every time you log in.
passwordDontMatchDescription: Passwords do not match. Please confirm your password.
whatIsTheAppAbout: BiteBook is a smart kitchen companion that helps you turn random ingredients into real meals, reduce food waste, and stretch every dollar at the grocery store.
whatIsTheAppAboutDescription: Instead of guessing what to cook, BiteBook shows you recipes based on what you already have, helps you plan your meals, and keeps your pantry, fridge, and shopping lists organized — all in one place.
aboutRosaryDescription: Most people buy groceries with good intentions, then watch food expire in the back of the fridge. BiteBook helps you track what you own, what’s expiring soon, and what you can cook before it goes to waste. The goal is simple: eat well, waste less, and save money every week.
useTheAppToDescription1: See recipes tailored to what you already have, so you cook more and waste less — even on busy nights.
useTheAppToDescription2: Plan meals before you shop, avoid duplicates, and get the most out of every grocery trip.
useTheAppToDescription3: Track pantry items, fridge, freezer, and leftovers so you always know what’s available and what’s about to expire.
AccentCardDescription1: Build balanced meal plans and discover recipes that help you eat better without overthinking every dinner.
AccentCardDescription2: Turn near-expiring ingredients into meals instead of trash. Every cooked ingredient is money saved.
AccentCardDescription3: Stop staring at your fridge wondering what to cook. BiteBook gives you clear, simple options fast.
footerCTA: Cook smarter, waste less, save more.
rosaryWeaponTitle: Your Secret Weapon in the Kitchen
rosaryWeaponDescription: BiteBook turns your kitchen chaos into a simple plan. Instead of forgetting what’s in the back of the fridge, you’ll see what needs to be used first, what meals you can cook, and how much you’re saving by not throwing food away. Small changes each week add up to real savings and better eating over time.
errorUpdatingPassword: Error updating password. Please try again.
whatIsTheRosaryDescription: BiteBook is your central hub for recipes, meal plans, and grocery tracking. It connects what you buy, what you store, and what you cook into one simple flow, so you stop wasting food and start getting more out of every ingredient.
whyPrayTheRosaryDescription: Because guessing is expensive. BiteBook helps you see what you have, plan what you’ll cook, and shop only for what you actually need.
welcomeDescription: Hi {{firstName}} {{lastName}}, BiteBook is here to help you cook smarter, waste less, and save more on groceries. If you’re just getting started, the next steps will walk you through how to add your ingredients, plan your meals, and get the most out of what you already have at home.
whatAreTheBenefitsDescription: With BiteBook, you’ll waste less food, save more money, reduce decision fatigue at mealtime, and feel in control of your kitchen again.
whatAreTheBenefitsOfRosary:
#### What You Get with BiteBook
1. Less food waste — use what you already have before it expires.  
2. Lower grocery bills — plan meals and avoid buying duplicates you don’t need.  
3. Faster decisions — no more staring at the fridge wondering what to cook.  
4. Smarter pantry — always know what’s in your pantry, fridge, and freezer.  
5. Healthier habits — build consistent meal plans aligned with your goals.  
6. Shared planning — coordinate meals and shopping with family or roommates.  
7. Peace of mind — feel organized instead of overwhelmed when it’s time to cook.
joinedAppBadge: You’ve just unlocked your first BiteBook achievement — taking control of your kitchen and saying goodbye to wasted groceries.
